description: AP-26 is the legacy RTO code for Nellore district (now Sri Potti Sriramulu Nellore) in Andhra Pradesh. Since February 2019, the state implemented the 'one state-one code' policy where all new vehicles are registered with AP-39/AP-40 series. This office continues to manage legacy AP-26 registrations.
address: Regional Transport Office, Nellore, Andhra Pradesh
